mapper.insert: INSERT INTO workflow (name, description, version, status, created_by, created_at, updated_at, is_deleted, definition) VALUES (#{name}, #{description}, #{version}, #{status}, #{createdBy}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt}, #{isDeleted}, #{definition})
